segments.text: Look ! Someone is celebrating his birthday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This must be his 21st birthday . No doubt about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? Do you know that guy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Well , in America , 21 is the age when you're allowed to drink . So , many guys celebrate it in bars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's interesting . But it would be really expensive , I suppose . Just think about all the drinks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . If it's your birthday , then you don't need to pay a cent . Just blow out the candles and open the gifts . That makes the birthday a special day . Your friends will take care of everything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about in China ? What'd you do to celebrate your birthday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nowadays , it's no difference from America . But in old times , we have traditional ways to celebrate it .
segments.speaker: S1
